Indicates that the N_Cmi_NetworkDiscovery has completed.

typedef void(* N_Cmi_JoinDone_t)(N_Cmi_Result_t result)

Indicates that a N_Cmi_Join, N_Cmi_Rejoin, N_Cmi_RejoinParent or N_Cmi_OrphanJoin has completed.

Parameters:
resultThe result of the action

typedef void(* N_Cmi_SetChannelDone_t)(void)

Indicates that a N_Cmi_SetMacChannel or N_Cmi_UpdateNetworkChannel has completed successfully.

N_Cmi_SetChannelDone_t  pfDoneCallback 
)

Set the MAC channel.

uint8_t N_Cmi_GetMacChannel ( void  )

Get the MAC channel.

N_Cmi_Result_t N_Cmi_StartNetworking ( N_Address_Extended_t  pExtendedPanId,
uint8_t  channel,
uint16_t  panId,
uint16_t  networkAddress,
uint8_t  networkUpdateId,
N_Security_Key_t  networkKey 
)

Start this device (router/end-device) in a ZigBee network.

void N_Cmi_StartRouter ( N_Cmi_StartRouterDone_t  pfDoneCallback)

Start routing on this device.

Parameters:
pfDoneCallbackPointer to the function that will be called when this function is done

A router device is not fully operational until this function returns success.

Note:
This function is only implemented on a router
void N_Cmi_NetworkDiscovery ( uint32_t  channelMask,
N_Beacon_Order_t  durationPerChannel,
N_Beacon_t *  pBeacon,
uint8_t  listSize,
N_Connection_AssociateDiscoveryMode_t  mode,
N_Address_ExtendedPanId_t *  extendedPanId,
N_Cmi_BeaconFilteringCriterion_t  filteringMode,
N_Cmi_BeaconIndication_t  pfBeaconReceivedCallback,
N_Cmi_NetworkDiscoveryDone_t  pfDoneCallback 
)

Perform a network discovery (active scan).

Parameters:
channelMaskThe channels to scan
durationPerChannelThe time to stay at each channel (enum)
pBeaconPointer to memory that is used to return a beacon from an open network.
listSizesize of the list behind pBeacon
modeThe discovery mode. Can be used to blacklist or specify a network.
extendedPanIdExtended pan id to join or to blacklist depending on the mode parameter.
filteringModeBeacon filtering mode - specifies the criterion for beacon handling.
pfBeaconReceivedCallbackPointer to the function that should be called on beacon reception.
pfDoneCallbackPointer to the function that should be called after the network discovery is done
void N_Cmi_Join ( N_Beacon_t *  pSelectedBeacon,
NWK_JoinMethod_t  method,
bool  isSecured,
N_Cmi_JoinDone_t  pfDoneCallback 
)

Perform a ZigBee network join (MAC association).

Parameters:
pSelectedBeaconThe beacon from a device to join to.
methodMethod used to perform the association.
isSecuredWhether the requested association type is secured or unsecured.
pfDoneCallbackPointer to the function that should be called after the join is done
void N_Cmi_Rejoin ( N_Beacon_t *  pSelectedBeacon,
bool  secure,
N_Cmi_JoinDone_t  pfDoneCallback 
)

Perform a ZigBee network rejoin to find a new parent (end-device only).

Parameters:
pSelectedBeaconThe beacon from a device to rejoin to.
secureWhether to do a secure rejoin (TRUE) or an unsecure rejoin (FALSE, only possible with central trustcenter)
pfDoneCallbackPointer to the function that should be called after the rejoin is done
Note:
This function is not implemented on a router
void N_Cmi_RejoinParent ( N_Cmi_JoinDone_t  pfDoneCallback)

Perform a ZigBee network rejoin with the old parent (end-device only).

Note:
This function is not implemented on a router
void N_Cmi_OrphanJoin ( N_Cmi_JoinDone_t  pfDoneCallback)

Perform a IEEE 802.15.4 orphan join to rejoin the old parent (end-device only).

Parameters:
pfDoneCallbackPointer to the function that should be called after the rejoin is done
Note:
This function is not implemented on a router
void N_Cmi_UpdateNetworkChannel ( uint8_t  channel,
uint8_t  networkUpdateId,
N_Cmi_SetChannelDone_t  pfDoneCallback 
)

Update the network channel and network update id

Parameters:
channelThe channel to change to.
networkUpdateIdThe network update id to update to.
pfDoneCallbackCallback that is called after completion. Allowed to be NULL (no callback).
void N_Cmi_AddChild ( N_Address_Extended_t  ieeeAddressEndDevice,
uint16_t  networkAddressEndDevice 
)

Add an end device to the child table.

Parameters:
ieeeAddressEndDeviceThe IEEE address of the end device to add to the child table
networkAddressEndDeviceThe network address of the end device to add to the child table
Note:
Calling this function for an end device is a fatal error.

Sets indirect poll rate for a given time interval; then restores the default poll rate.

[in]rate- poll rate to be set
[in]time- time interval for poll rate, ms

Sets the type of groupcast to be used - NWK multicast or APS Groupcast.

Parameters:
[in]multicast- if true NWK multicast will be used.
